Remnick: journalist, author, magazine editor. He is not a professor of history or Russian politics.

Atheism is the name. Atheist is the name of the practicioner. See Gandhi, Jinnah, etc etc. Islam/Hinduism NOT Muslim/Hindu.

Atheism is not a religion, but the lack of it. A person who has no religion is an Atheist.

"secret police" terminology is biased, lacking neutrality
